sections.heading: Duress by third personConsent is vitiated even when duress has been exerted by a third person.Acts 1984, No. 331, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1985.
sections.text: Duress by third personConsent is vitiated even when duress has been exerted by a third person.Acts 1984, No. 331, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1985.
